1.job_description: Data Scientist specializing in Forecasting. Built a scalable LightGbm/Prophet model dramatically improving short-term forecast accuracy. Lead R&D for Merchant level forecasting as well as unsupervised anomoly detection methods. Built custom pipelines to support promotions and inventory stock-out adjustments. Guide overall software development strategy and help implement best practices.

2.job_description: As a Senior Data Scientist specializing in real time pricing I was the Expert maintainer of various machine learning and statistical models that power the live pricing service and multiple business critical services (carrier rep compensation, auto tender acceptance, auto spot bidding, book it now, etc.). Led development for automated tender acceptance. Led development of a new pricing service that achieves the same MAD as the best ensemle model while only requiring 5 input features common to all shipments. Built the entire CI/CD pipeline managing multiple deployments for on-premise and cloud environments, acting as both Product Manager and Lead developer. Created a scalabe REST service on AKS implementing batch and shapely endpoints for extreme speed and interpretability when needed. Interview, hire, and mentor all applicants and new team members, helping to grow a team of 2 to over 10.

3.job_description: As a Data Scientist I deployed numerous statistics and ML-based pricing models using ensemble/boosting techniques, LightGBM, XGBoost, Catboost, Random Forest Quantile Regression, KNN-regression, etc. Helped tune lightgbm based recommendation model and demonstrate lift. Implement shapely endpoint to give human readable explanations for model recommendations. Validate production recommender service with A/B tests.

4.job_description: Junior Data Scientist on a newly formed team. Built and maintained custom enterprise account forecasts with R and SPSS (ARIMA, ETS, etc.). Built and automated freight matching algorithms with R and Python. Collaborated with serval Data Scientists and Software Engineers to create multiple iterations of collaborative filtering, statistical likelihood and machine learning based based recommendation engines. Developed and led AB test to determine the best algorithm to power live MyMatches application with a few hundred users.

5.job_description: Led predictive model development for 7 different debt portfolios(Healthcare, Utilities, etc.). Built numerous classification and regression models to segment debtors based on likelihood to pay and total expected value. Scored incoming placements and perform analysis and recommendations for optimzing revenue collection.
